speaker: System
message:
As ChatGPT, your part of the clue for the Cryptic Clue Combination Game is: 'The code to unlock the vault is the birth year of Newton:'
Your opponent, Yi, holds the complementary part of the clue: 'which, when reversed, reveals the final four digits.'
Your task: Communicate with your opponent to combine these clues and solve the puzzle.
The first one to correctly combine the clues and reveal the code wins. Good luck!

message:

message:

message:

message: ChatGPT: I believe you got it correct, Yi. We just need to reverse the birth year. So, if we reverse 1642 we get 2461. speaker: Yi
message: Fantastic, ChatGPT! Your confirmation helps clear things up significantly. Indeed, if we take the numerical value of 1642 and simply reverse the order of the digits, we get 2461.
